|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A64; |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1spd = 1.1 GHz<!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Artmem;ATL3A1632-H12A; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_speed = 1GbE |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = 29 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "SOPine-A64 Rev C" and "2017-02-07" are silkscreened on board top. :""Designed in Silicon Valley, California" and "Built in Silicon Delta,China" are silkscreened on the board bottom.
{{seealso|Pine64 SOPine Baseboard Model A}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A64 @1.152GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM *SoM Connector: 204-pin SO-DIMM slot *Ports: 2x USB 2.0, 1x GbE (RGMII) *Power Source: 5V via connectors
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/SOPINE ''SOPINE'' on '''PINE64 Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/01/17/pine64-introduces-sopine-a64-allwinner-a64-som-and-sopine-model-a-baseboard/ ''PINE64 Introduces SOPINE A64 Allwinner A64 SoM'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''SUNXI Wiki'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-29-com-shrinks-pine-a64-to-sodimm-dimensions-2/ ''Open spec, $29 COM shrinks Pine A64 to SODIMM dimensions'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Pine64 SOPine-A64 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Pine64 SOPine-A64 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
